tool_description: Real-time Play by Play, Season Schedule, Weekly Schedules, Daily Schedules, Team Information, Team Stats, Player Information, Player Stats, Injuries and Depth Charts for the NBA.
name: Basketball - DataFeeds by Rolling Insights
title: Basketball - DataFeeds by Rolling Insights

api_list.name: Team Information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-datafeeds-by-rolling-insights.p.rapidapi.com/team-info/NBA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-datafeeds-by-rolling-insights.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-datafeeds-by-rolling-insights.p.rapidapi.com/team-info/{sport}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-datafeeds-by-rolling-insights.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Player Injuries
api_list.description: Returns a record of each player's injury on a team

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description:
Format: One specified team ID
Team ID is available in the Team Info endpoint

api_list.name: Daily Schedule
api_list.description: Returns season schedule for the specified date or "now" returns current day's schedule. Daily schedule is changed at 10 AM ET.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
now returns current day's schedule. Daily schedule is changed at 10 AM ET.

Format: string now or YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description:
Format: One specified team ID
Team ID is available in the Team Info endpoint

api_list.name: Player Season Statistics

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description:
Format: One specified team ID
Team ID is available in the Team Info endpoint

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description:
Parameter can be omitted and request will return player stats for current season. Specify the beginning of sport season, ie: 2017-2018 season = 2017.

Format: YYYY

api_list.name: Team Season Statistics

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description:
Parameter can be omitted and request will return player stats for current season. Specify the beginning of sport season, ie: 2017-2018 season = 2017.

Format: YYYY

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description:
Format: One specified team ID
Team ID is available in the Team Info endpoint

api_list.name: Weekly Schedule
api_list.description: Returns all events from the date specified plus 7 days in advance

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
Returns all events from the date specified plus 7 days in advance.

Format: now or YYYY-MM-DD

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-datafeeds-by-rolling-insights.p.rapidapi.com/schedule-week/now/NBA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-datafeeds-by-rolling-insights.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Team Depth Charts
api_list.description: Returns player depth charts for a team

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description:
Format: One specified team ID
Team ID is available in the Team Info endpoint

api_list.name: Live Game Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides real-time game box scores.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
now returns current day's schedule. Daily schedule is changed at 10 AM ET.

Format: string now or YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description:
Format: One specified team ID
Team ID is available in the Team Info endpoint

api_list.name: Player Information
api_list.description: This endpoint returns player demographic information

api_list.name: Season Schedule
api_list.description: Returns season schedule for the specified season. If omitted, returns the schedule for current season.

optional_parameters.name: team_id
optional_parameters.description:
Format: One specified team ID
Team ID is available in the Team Info endpoint
